```{r}

get_plot <- function(data) {
  p <- ggplot(bind_cols(data,
                        bas_dt %>%
                          select(Population,
                                 avg_qual_mean))) +
    geom_point(aes(avg_qual_mean,
                   snp),
               size = 1,
               alpha = 0.4) +
    geom_point(aes(avg_qual_mean,
              p0,
              colour = "iaf"),
                             size = .5,
                alpha = 0.6) +
    geom_point(aes(avg_qual_mean,
                  p1,
                  colour = "predicted"),
                size = .5) +
    theme_bw() +
   facet_wrap( ~ Population)
  
  return(p)
}



```
```{r}
ggplot(subsets) +
    geom_point(aes(b,
                   dev_logp),
               size = .7,
               alpha = 0.4
) 
```



```{r, fig.width=20}
subsets_plots <-
 subsets_top %>%
    mutate(plotted= future_map(data, get_plot))  %>%
  pull(plotted)
```
